GSD.description:
USB: core: Fix hang in usb_kill_urb by adding memory barriers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.96 by commit e3b131e30e612ff0e32de6c1cb4f69f89db29193. For more details please see the references link.
